notes:
V3.19.72 — 16.01.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue where List Messages were not sent correctly in Auto Reply mode.

V3.19.71 — 15.01.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue where messages sent to new contacts were delivered but the chat did not appear or open correctly.

V3.19.46 — 02.01.2026
────────────────────────
• Fixed an issue where the program could freeze during scanning when reaching the contact verification stage inside WaDefender.

V3.19.45 — 21.12.2025
────────────────────────
• Comprehensive fix for Welcome Messages and Quick Replies to ensure media and messages are delivered successfully to new numbers and Ad leads.
• Fixed messaging issues when contacting users selected via Labels.
• New organized UI: Added a smart folding feature for Quick Reply buttons to save screen space, with an option to pin frequently used replies.
